forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 3C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 38F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
